author: peterjm
msg: Modified code to search for recursive includes.  Adds a fallback to the href attribute of the include element, if the system id is not available.  This also fixes a bug where and NPE would be thrown when the XMLLocator passed to the searchForRecursiveIncludes() method had no system id or expanded system id.

author: werner
msg: Make the F8 cipher mode independent of AES, in principle this mode is usable
with other block ciphers as well (but it is standardized / inter-operable

author: bpendleton
msg: The test was out of sync with the SQL States in the code. In revision
392060, the SQL state "0AX01" was replaced by "0A000". This change
updates the test to use the new SQL State, and callable.java now passes.

author: werner
msg: Modify to use generic F8 parameters

author: yonik
msg: refactor /update to separate servlet, allow post of query to /select
